mainText:
Dear family and close friend of Steve:
For me Steve was my hero, i wanted to be like him, he was such a genius he changed the way i see life cause he made apple bigger and gave apple prestige. 
I hope Steve wherever he is, feels so proud of all the things that he did cause his death is great lost for everybody i know...this is another sad thank you for all the things and i know i'll never have the chance

RIP Steve Jobs
My deepest condolences
author: Genaro
